articles.author: PTI
articles.title: What let us down was batsmanship, says MS Dhoni
articles.description: Chennai Super Kings skipper Mahendra Singh Dhoni pulled up his batters for their poor shot selection after suffering a 13-run loss to Royal Challengers Bangalore, which pushed the defending champions to the brink of elimination.
articles.content:
Harshal Patel picked up three crucial wickets and is adjudged Player of the Match as #RCB win by 13 runs.#TATAIPL https://t.co/7dw4sgceYO
— IndianPremierLeague (@IPL) 1651686964000

articles.author: AP
articles.title: Survivor found almost 6 days after China building collapse
articles.description: The unidentified woman is the 10th survivor of the disaster in the city of Changsha, in which at least five people have died and an unknown number, possibly dozens, are still missing. She was rescued shortly after midnight on Thursday, about 132 hours after t…
articles.content: Survivor found almost 6 days after China building collapse

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Twitter courts advertisers amid uncertain future under Musk
articles.description: The Tesla chief executive, who is buying Twitter for $44 billion, has tweeted that the platform should not have ads so it can have more control over its content moderation policies.
articles.content: Twitter courts advertisers amid uncertain future under Elon Musk
